Interface ConceptBeta

Represents a concept with various properties and relationships.

interface Concept {
    allLabelKeys: string[];
    allProperties: undefined | Property[];
    archetype: string;
    columns: string[];
    concept_name: string;
    labelKeys: string[];
    parents: string[];
    properties: undefined | Property[];
    relationships: Relationship[];
    tags: Tag[];
}
